tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE data_retention_policies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    retention_period INT NOT NULL,
    legal_compliance BOOLEAN DEFAULT false
)

CREATE TABLE organization (
    org_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    org_name VARCHAR(255),
    founded_date DATE,
    data_retention_policy_id INT,
    data_protection_law_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (data_retention_policy_id) REFERENCES data_retention_policy(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (data_protection_law_id) REFERENCES data_protection_law(law_id)
);

CREATE TABLE organization_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_name VARCHAR(255),
    data_type VARCHAR(50),
    data_owner VARCHAR(100),
    data_retention_policy_id INT,
    data_protection_law_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE data_audit_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    action_performed VARCHAR(50),
    data_id INT,
    user_id INT
);
